Are there any resources available to verify the safety of the Verus software downloads?

Yes, the Verus software downloads have been scanned by VirusTotal, a reputable online virus scanner. You can view the scan results for each platform (MacOS, Linux-x86-64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows) by following the provided links. This can help verify the safety of the software downloads.
